name: Player Killers' Exchange
description:
The Player Killers' Exchange is a multiplayer action RPG. Kill NPCs to loot equipment. Kill players for fun and profit.

Many of you have been griefing the Internet for years now. But why do it for free? Put your PK skills to the test and earn rewards at the same time.

  • Read more at the blog
  • Enter the game (without itch.io's iframe, allows team play)
  • 711 interconnected areas
  • Collect items to craft upgrades and special equipment
  • Conquer and control castles to command the realms
  • Give feedback and report bugs
  • Regular updates
  • Top 100 high scores
